channel.title: Fashion on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Fashion on Game6r

item.title: Elsa Valentine Day Diary
item.description: Help the girl get ready for Valentine’s Day. The heroine of the game wants to get a chic outfit that her lover will like. You need to dress up the girl, choosing every detail of the dress and their color. You can also change the hairstyle and dye your hair to make the look even more original.

item.title: Pony Dress Up
item.description: In this game you have to take care of a cute horse. The process consists of several stages. First you need to wash the pony using shampoo and other auxiliaries. Next, the horse has to be dried and combed. The final step will be the choice of a mane, tail, saddle, pattern on the body.

item.title: Wedding Preps
item.description: The heroine of the game is preparing for her own wedding. Naturally, she wants to look really chic on such an important holiday. Therefore, you need to help the bride to dress up. Choose a beautiful dress, shoes, jewelry, veil. Do not forget about the wedding bouquet, it is an essential attribute of the image.
